item.description:
Let's head down to the bar at Morton's The Steakhouse for their Power Happy Hour.

Before you go to or come from home, the gym, work, dinner, or wherever, meet new drinking buddies with whom you can share your old stories.

Get there when you can and stay for a minute or two or three or four or more...however long you're able. I'll arrive at 5 and hang until 8...unless

Morton's offers select $4 beer, $5 wine and $7 mortinis as well as $6 bar bites from 5 PM until 11PM.

Morton's Power Happy Hour Deal

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Copley subway station (green line) is closest, less than a (five (5) minute walk). Back Bay subway station (orange line and commuter rail) is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Below the first floor at the bar
item.name: Power Happy Hour Friday March 19th
